麘字的基本解释

麘
xiāng
古同“香”。

麘字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiāng］
［《集韻》虚良切，平陽，曉。］
同“香1”。

麘字的康熙字典解释

【亥集下】【鹿字部】　麘； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1511第02
【集韻】虛良切，音香。麝麘，獸名。【本草】麝香，形似麞，常食柏葉，五月得香。本作香。俗加鹿。【字彙】麝麘，獸臍。

麘字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
麘字的起名意思

暂无。

麘
Basic explanation of words
麘
xiāng
Ancient with "fragrance".
麘
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiāng］
["Jiyun" Xuliangqie, Pingyang, Xiao. ]
Same as "Xiang 1".
麘
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Haiji 2] [Deer Department] 　麘; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 1511 Page 02
[Jiyun] virtual good cut, sound fragrance. Musk, the name of the animal. 【Materia Medica】Musk, shaped like roe deer, often eats cypress leaves, and gets incense in May. This makes incense. Custom plus deer. 【Vocabulary】Musk, animal umbilicus.
